title: BootSpace
about: A social app that takes authorized github profile data and builds your profile page on BootSpace. Data is saved in Firebase, and you can log in & out of your account.

title: Budget Tracker
about: A PWA that takes in user data and stashes it locally till a connection to a secure database is made. Auth0 is used to log in & and out of your account.

title: Rgermaine Books
about: A CRUD PWA that stores a list of books to read. You can read, write, and delete your list from storage kept on MongoDB.

title: Deedlist
about: A Craigslist like web app I contributed to that stores/searches 'needs' or 'deeds' for people that need help.

title: Workout Tracker
about: A web app that helps users track their workout progress. Charts are also used for data visualization of users timeline

title: Note Taker
about: An online note taking tool that creates, saves, and deletes your personalized notes. No sign up required!

title: Reverse Engineer Code
about: An article I wrote about deconstructing the various files in modern MVC frameworks

title: Foodle
about: A meal recipe search engine I co-engineered with some former classmates at University of Denver. Now deprecated.

title: JS Password Generator
about: My first app! A password generator that runs on a series of questions. More of a milestone to see how far I've come.
